usageInfo.name: Disclaimer and Feedback Policy
usageInfo.text: This IP First Response website has been designed to help IP rights holders navigate IP infringement and enforcement by making it visible, accessible, and to provide information about the factors involved in pursuing different options. It does not provide legal, business or other professional advice, and none of the content should be regarded as recommending a specific course of action. We welcome any feedback via our IP First Response feedback form and by emailing us.

isPartOf.name: IP First Response
isPartOf.description: A first port of call for businesses to easily understand complex intellectual property issues.

mainEntity.name: See unfiltered list of ip first response information?
Check your product against existing designs?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Conduct a thorough search of existing registered designs to determine whether you are free to launch your product into a market - also known as Freedom to Operate (FTO) search. \
**Estimated cost:**\
Free, plus optional professional fees\
**Estimated effort:**\
Hours\
**Rate of resolution:**\
Not applicable](/options/check-your-product-against-existing-designs)

[Hiring a professional

Different professionals offer different expertise. Find out who does what, how they can help, and what to consider when choosing someone for your situation.](/options/choosing-right-ip-professional)

[Court - PBR

Escalate a wide range of design rights matters to court.\
**Estimated cost:**\
$100k+ in legal fees\
**Estimated effort:**\
Years\
**Rate of resolution:**\
Court decisions are binding although appeal is possible](/options/court-designs)
